titleStmt.title: XXVIII sermons preached at Golden Grove being for the summer half-year, beginning on Whit-Sunday, and ending on the xxv Sunday after Trinity, together with A discourse of the divine institution, necessity, sacredness, and separation of the office ministeriall / by Jer. Taylor.
Sermons. Selections
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.N. for Richard Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: This work also appears, on reel 828:3, as the second item in: Eniautos / Jer. Taylor (Wing T329).

Imperfect: "Clerus Domini: or, A discourse ... of the office ministerial ... London, Printed by James Flesher, for R. Royston ... 1651" which has special t.p. and separate paging is lacking on filmed copy.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
